sequence.msg: THEY’RE DOING WHAT? Oh man oh man oh man, this can’t be good. What do we do?
I’m pretty freaked-out right now, ngl. Though if we get through this, we’re gonna get some sick memes out of it.

This sounds straight out of some kind of eldritch horror roleplaying game or something. I knew there was something more to all this button pressing. How do we stop it? You got a plan? None of this makes any sense whatsoever!
This is really freaky. I totally didn’t have “employer turns out to be a cult feeding souls to an ancient evil to force the apocalypse” on my disaster bingo card.
